backend/main.mo: Defines the main HRMS backend actor with authorization mixin, employee data models, onboarding tasks, goals, performance cycles, reviews, questionnaire responses, appraisal details, and in‑memory maps with ID generation.
backend/migration.mo: Provides data‑migration logic and type conversions for upgrading employee profiles, adding externalEmployeeId support, and transforming old actor state into the new format.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature‑evidence entries linking features to affected frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains autogenerated 1–2 sentence summaries for numerous frontend files describing each component's purpose and key behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and full CSS variable theme tokens for light and dark mode, applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app configuring router, authentication, auto profile creation, access gate flow, and layout routing for all HRMS modules.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessGateS: Collects first and last name before proceeding to Internet Identity login, showing validation errors and allowing reset.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Provides a sign‑in button using Internet Identity and displays login status.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for initial user profile setup, allowing entry of name and optional email before saving.
frontend/src/components/employees/Employ: Dialog for creating or editing an employee record with fields for personal and job details and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/feedback/AccessD: Displays an access‑denied message for unauthorized users with a button to return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with navigation, user menu, admin‑aware links, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Onboa: Editor for creating and assigning onboarding tasks to an employee, supporting add, remove, and update actions.
frontend/src/components/performance/Goal: Dialog component for creating or updating employee goals, handling form state and submitting mutations for adding goals or updating progress.
frontend/src/components/performance/Revi: Allows employees, managers, and HR to edit and submit different review sections, with conditional UI based on admin role and review status.
frontend/src/components/search/GlobalSea: Admin-only global search bar that debounces input, fetches search results, and navigates to the relevant employee, onboarding, or performance pages.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccessGate.ts: Manages a simple localStorage-backed access gate, storing a completion flag and user name with methods to complete or reset the gate.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend API calls for user profiles, roles, employees, onboarding, goals, reviews, appraisals, and search operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables for light/dark mode, and utility component styles including background and readable-surface elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and imports global styles.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/DashboardPa: Renders the user dashboard with hero section, quick stats, onboarding progress, and navigation cards.
frontend/src/pages/employees/EmployeeDet: Displays detailed employee info with admin edit options and handles loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/employees/EmployeeDir: Provides an admin-only searchable employee directory with creation and detail navigation.
frontend/src/pages/employees/MyProfilePa: Shows the logged-in user's employee profile with loading and empty-state handling.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/Onboarding: Admin page for selecting employees and managing their onboarding tasks, including questionnaire navigation.
Displays an employee's onboarding tasks, progress, status updates, and load/error states using data query hooks.
Manages onboarding questionnaire flow, including loading questions, capturing responses, admin employee selection, and submitting answers.
frontend/src/pages/performance/Appraisal: Loads and displays performance appraisal details for an employee, with admin employee selection and sample appraisal creation.
frontend/src/pages/performance/GoalsPage: Shows performance goals for an employee, supports admin employee switching, and provides a dialog to add new goals.
frontend/src/pages/performance/ReviewsPa: Handles viewing employee review cycles, creating new cycles and reviews, and admin employee selection.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routes), storing/retrieving them in sessionStorage, and syncing URL params to session persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, container settings, fonts, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, issues, and feature requests for an employee appraisal app, including profile loading, appraisal data, and onboarding questionnaire problems.
